abstract: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day of the year format style.

codeExamples.code:
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 3:00 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear(.defaultDigits)) // 40
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear(.twoDigits)) // 40
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear(.threeDigits)) // 040
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear()) // 40

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified day of the year style.

## Discussion

Values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear] are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/defaultDigits], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/threeDigits], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/twoDigits].

This example shows a variety of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear] formats applied to a date:

If you don’t provide a format, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/defaultDigits] static variable is the default format.

For more information about formatting dates, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle].

# dayOfYear(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the date format style to use the specified day of the year format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func dayOfYear(_ format: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.DayOfYear = .defaultDigits) -> Date.FormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The day of the year format style applied to the date format style.

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified day of the year style.

## Discussion

Values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear] are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/defaultDigits], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/threeDigits], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/twoDigits].

This example shows a variety of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear] formats applied to a date:

```swift
let meetingDate = Date() // Feb 9, 2021 at 3:00 PM
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear(.defaultDigits)) // 40
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear(.twoDigits)) // 40
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear(.threeDigits)) // 040
meetingDate.formatted(Date.FormatStyle().dayOfYear()) // 40

```

If you don’t provide a format, the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/DayOfYear/defaultDigits] static variable is the default format.

For more information about formatting dates, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle].

## Specifying the Date Format

- **day(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day format style.
- **era(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified era format style.
- **month(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified month format style.
- **quarter(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified quarter format style.
- **week(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified week format style.
- **weekday(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified weekday format style.
- **year(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified year format style.
- **Date.FormatStyle.DateStyle**: Type that defines date styles varied in length or components included.
